Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.beans

Class PlayerBoardBean

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.beans.PlayerBoardBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer, PlayerBean
public class PlayerBoardBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer, PlayerBean
Class used to serialize a PlayerBoard object, send it over the network and store its information in the client

      Sends the serialized bean to the player with the given username

    • printLine

      public java.lang.String printLine​(int line)
      This method is used to print only one line of the PlayerBoard so that multiple objects can be printed in parallel in the CLI. It does not display leader cards
      Parameters:
      line - the line to print (starts from 1)
      Returns:
      the String with the line to print

    • printLine

      public java.lang.String printLine​(int line, java.lang.String clientUsername)
      This method is used to print only one line of the PlayerBoard so that multiple objects can be printed in parallel in the CLI. It requires the client's player's username in order to know which leader cards to print
      Parameters:
      line - the line to print (starts from 1)
      clientUsername - the client's player's username
      Returns:
      the String with the line to print

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Prints a String representation of the bean's data. It does not display leader cards
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      the String representation

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString​(java.lang.String clientUsername)
